quotes.message: A Tough life with God is better than a good life without Him.
quotes.name: David Asscherick

quotes.message: When the going gets tough, the tough take a nap.
quotes.name: Tom Hodgkinson

quotes.message: To be tested is good. The challenged life may be the best therapist.
quotes.name: Gail Sheehy

quotes.message: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
quotes.name: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.message: Life is as easy or as hard as you think it is.
quotes.name: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.message: Life is tough so get tougher.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: It's a tough life if you don't weaken.
quotes.name: Stephen King

quotes.message: The soul is renewed through tough times.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: You're going to go through tough times - that's life. But I say, 'Nothing happens to you, it happens for you.' See the positive in negative events.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Life is tough; and if you have the ability to laugh at it, you have the ability to enjoy it.
quotes.name: Salma Hayek

quotes.message: Life is, at times, tough...And all we need to do is to prove that we are tougher than it...
quotes.name: Sanhita Baruah

quotes.message: Life is tough, but it's tougher if you're stupid.
quotes.name: John Wayne

quotes.message: The key to life when it gets tough is to keep moving. Just keep moving.
quotes.name: Tyler Perry

quotes.message: When you are tough on yourself, life is going to be infinitely easier on you.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: Life is tough - and you have to be tougher than life to change the world.
quotes.name: Sebastian Pinera

quotes.message: A tough life can be defeated only by the tougher person!
quotes.name: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.message: When the going gets tough, the tough reinvent.
quotes.name: RuPaul

quotes.message: When the going gets tough, the tough go drinking.
quotes.name: Bret Easton Ellis

quotes.message: A tough lesson in life that one has to learn is that not everybody wishes you well.
quotes.name: Dan Rather

quotes.message: When you think life is tough, it can get a lot tougher
quotes.name: Kate Gosselin

quotes.message: When the going gets tough, the tough get going.
quotes.name: Joseph P. Kennedy

quotes.message: Life is a matter of really tough choices.
quotes.name: Joe Biden

quotes.message: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: Life's a tough proposition, and the first hundred years are the hardest.
quotes.name: Wilson Mizner

quotes.message: Life is tough, but so are you.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
quotes.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.message: Life is very tough. If you don't laugh, it's tough.
quotes.name: Joan Rivers

quotes.message: Thoughts make life tough.
quotes.name: Bharath Mamidoju
